faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about InstaOrbit

q1.question: Is InstaOrbit free to use?
q1.answer: Yes! InstaOrbit is completely free. No hidden charges, no subscriptions, no premium plans. Download unlimited Instagram content at no cost.

q2.question: Do I need to create an account?
q2.answer: No account needed. Simply paste the Instagram URL and download. We don't store any of your personal data.

q3.question: What content can I download?
q3.answer: You can download Instagram Reels, Videos, Photos, Stories, IGTV, and carousel posts. All in original HD quality.

q4.question: Is it safe to use InstaOrbit?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We use secure HTTPS connections, don't store any user data, and never ask for your Instagram login credentials.

q5.question: Why isn't my download working?
q5.answer: Make sure the Instagram post is public. Private account content cannot be downloaded. Also check that you're using the correct URL format.

q6.question: Can I download from private accounts?
q6.answer: No, InstaOrbit only works with public Instagram posts. We respect user privacy and content restrictions.

how-to-download-instagram-reels.title: How to Download Instagram Reels to Your Gallery (2025 Guide)
how-to-download-instagram-reels.description: Learn the fastest ways to download Instagram Reels with audio and without watermarks.
how-to-download-instagram-reels.metaDescription: Learn 3 fast ways to download Instagram Reels with audio and without watermarks. Step-by-step guide for iPhone, Android, and PC.

section1.title: Why Download Instagram Reels?
section1.content: Instagram Reels are addictive, but the app doesn't make it easy to save them directly to your phone—especially if you want them with audio and without that annoying watermark. Whether you want to save a funny clip to share on WhatsApp or keep a recipe for later, this guide covers how to download Instagram Reels in high quality using free tools.

section2.title: Method 1: The Copy Link Method (Best Quality)
section2.step1: Open Instagram and find the Reel you want to save.
section2.step2: Tap the Three Dots (...) or the Share icon at the bottom right.
section2.step3: Tap 'Copy Link' to copy the Reel URL.
section2.step4: Open your browser and go to our Instagram Reels Downloader.
section2.step5: Paste the link and hit 'Download'. The video will save to your gallery instantly.

how-to-download-instagram-reels.benefit1: No Watermark: Clean video perfectly suitable for reposting
how-to-download-instagram-reels.benefit2: Original Audio: Keeps the music and sound intact
how-to-download-instagram-reels.benefit3: Safe & Secure: No need to log in to your Instagram account

download-instagram-stories-without-app.title: How to Download Instagram Stories Without an App (Anonymous Viewer)
download-instagram-stories-without-app.description: Save Instagram Stories before they expire, without installing any app.
download-instagram-stories-without-app.metaDescription: Want to save an Instagram Story before it expires? Here is how to download IG stories online without installing an app or notifying the user.

section1.title: Why Download Instagram Stories?
section1.content: Instagram Stories disappear after 24 hours. But what if you want to keep a memory, save a recipe, or download a video from your favorite influencer? Unlike posts, Instagram offers no built-in way to save other people's stories. Here is how to download Instagram stories without an app—and yes, it works on both iPhone and Android.

section2.title: The Browser Method (No App Needed)
section2.step1: Get the Username: Just know the exact Instagram username (e.g., @instagram).
section2.step2: Go to our Story Downloader: Navigate to the 'Story' tab on our homepage.
section2.step3: Enter Username: Type the handle into the search box.
section2.step4: View & Download: Our tool will fetch all active stories from the last 24 hours.
section2.step5: Save Anonymously: The user won't see your name in their 'Seen' list.

download-instagram-stories-without-app.benefit1: Anonymous viewing - they won't know you watched
download-instagram-stories-without-app.benefit2: No app installation required - works in browser
download-instagram-stories-without-app.benefit3: Download Highlights too - access archived stories

save-instagram-reels-without-watermark.title: How to Save Instagram Reels Without Watermark (Free Online Tool)
save-instagram-reels-without-watermark.description: Remove the Instagram watermark from Reels for reposting to TikTok or YouTube Shorts.
save-instagram-reels-without-watermark.metaDescription: Removing the 'Instagram' watermark from Reels is essential for reposting to TikTok or YouTube Shorts. Here is the free tool to do it.

section1.title: Why Remove the Watermark?
section1.content: If you are a content creator, you know the struggle. You spend hours editing a Reel, and when you save it to your phone, Instagram slaps a bouncing watermark and its logo on the video. If you try to repost that watermarked video to TikTok or YouTube Shorts, their algorithms will penalize you. They suppress content that has competitor logos.

section2.title: The Link-to-MP4 Solution
section2.step1: Don't use the 'Save' button in the Instagram editing menu.
section2.step2: Instead, Publish the Reel (or post it to a private test account).
section2.step3: Once posted, tap the three dots on the Reel and select 'Copy Link'.
section2.step4: Head over to InstaOrbit and paste the link.
section2.step5: Hit Download - you get the raw MP4 file without the watermark overlay.

save-instagram-reels-without-watermark.benefit1: Clean MP4: Raw file directly from Instagram's server
save-instagram-reels-without-watermark.benefit2: No Watermark: Perfect for reposting to other platforms

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: InstaOrbit Privacy Policy - Learn how we protect your data and privacy when using our Instagram downloader service.
privacy.introduction: At InstaOrbit, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Instagram content downloading service.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect minimal data to provide our service:

• Instagram URLs you submit for downloading
• Basic usage analytics (page views, country)
• No personal information is required
• No account creation needed

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content:
We use the data solely to:

• Process your download requests
• Improve our service performance
• Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
• We never sell or share your data with third parties

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
Your security is our priority:

• All connections use HTTPS encryption
• Downloaded URLs are not stored permanently
• No cookies are used for tracking
• We don't require or store Instagram credentials

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We use the following third-party services:

• Vercel for hosting and analytics
• No advertising networks
• No social tracking pixels
• No data brokers or resellers

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content:
We retain data minimally:

• Download requests are processed in real-time
• No permanent storage of your requests
• Analytics data is anonymized
• You can request deletion at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
For privacy-related inquiries:

• Email: support@instaorbits.com
• We respond within 48 hours
• GDPR and CCPA requests honored

gdpr.title: Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA)
gdpr.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete any personal data we may have. Since we don't collect personal information, there's typically nothing to delete. Contact us if you have any concerns.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: InstaOrbit Terms of Service - Read our terms and conditions for using our free Instagram video downloader.
terms.introduction: Welcome to InstaOrbit. By using our service, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our Instagram content downloading tool.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing or using InstaOrbit, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part, you may not use our service.

• You must be at least 13 years old
• You agree to use the service legally
• These terms may be updated at any time

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content:
You may use InstaOrbit to:

• Download publicly available Instagram content
• Save content for personal, non-commercial use
• Back up your own Instagram content

You may NOT use it to:
• Download private or restricted content
• Violate anyone's copyright or privacy
• Resell or redistribute downloaded content

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content:
Important copyright information:

• Downloaded content belongs to its original creators
• InstaOrbit does not claim ownership of any content
• Respect content creators' rights at all times
• We are not responsible for how you use downloaded content

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content:
The following activities are strictly prohibited:

• Attempting to hack or exploit the service
• Using automated bots for mass downloading
• Downloading content for harassment purposes
• Circumventing Instagram's terms of service
• Any illegal activities using our service

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content:
InstaOrbit is provided 'as is' without warranties:

• We don't guarantee 100% uptime
• Download success depends on Instagram's policies
• We're not affiliated with Instagram or Meta
• Use at your own risk and responsibility

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We may modify these terms at any time:

• Changes are effective immediately upon posting
• Continued use constitutes acceptance
• Major changes will be announced on the site
• Review terms periodically for updates

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.metaDescription: Contact InstaOrbit - Get help with our Instagram video downloader or send us feedback.
contact.subtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Our team typically responds within 24-48 hours.

faq.title: Check Our FAQ First
faq.content: Many common questions are already answered in our FAQ section. You might find your answer there!
